Package org.apache.james.protocols.smtp.core.fastfail

Class Summary
AbstractGreylistHandler Abstract base class which implement GreyListing.
AbstractValidRcptHandler Handler which want todo an recipient check should extend this
DNSRBLHandler Connect handler for DNSRBL processing
MaxRcptHandler  
ResolvableEhloHeloHandler This CommandHandler can be used to reject not resolvable EHLO/HELO
ReverseEqualsEhloHeloHandler  
SpamTrapHandler This handler can be used for providing a spam trap.
SupressDuplicateRcptHandler This handler can be used to just ignore duplicated recipients.
TarpitHandler Add tarpit support to SMTPServer.
ValidSenderDomainHandler Add MFDNSCheck feature to SMTPServer.
